document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of the chondrichthyans of Papua New Guinea

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated checklist of the chondrichthyans of Papua New Guinea

subSubSection.paragraph:
Carcharias acutus Rüppell, 1837: 65
, pl. 18 (fig. 4). Lectotype: SMF 2783 (stuffed). Type locality: Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, Red Sea.

Local synonymy:
Rhizoprionodon acutus—
Filewood, 1973 : 4 (PNG); Kailola, 1987 : 18 (Darapap; Gogol River mouth; Ramu River mouth; Rabual; Orangerie Bay; Port Moresby; Yule Island);
Fricke et al. , 2014
: 12 (Madang);
White et al. , 2018
: 174, figs (PNG).

PNG
voucher material:

Remarks: First recorded from PNG by Filewood (1973) . Sometimes confused with
Carcharhinus macloti
. Common in the bycatch of the Gulf of Papua prawn trawl fishery and in coastal fisheries in PNG .
